info.name: Keep my Google Doodle: Google Beta
info.description: Permanently replace the logo on Google homepage by the “Google Beta” logo. Like in 1998!
info.additionalInfo: UPDATES 2015/05/10 • Original release ADVICES This userstyle only apply on the regular desktop Google Search homepage, doesn't works with mobile version. Also doesn't replace the logo in the search results page header. KNOWN ISSUES This Google Doodle may appear blurry with high density/Retina displays. CREDITS All credits to their original authors.
